Class CreditCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment_four_task_one_Javadoc.CreditCard

  • public class CreditCard
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the credit card information for a specific customer.
    Version:
    1.0 - October 14th, 2016
    Author:
    Team Siki

    • Constructor Detail

      • CreditCard

        public CreditCard(int numbers,
                  java.lang.String expirationdate,
                  int cvs)
        Constructor for the credit card object. Uses the getters due to the attributes of the object being private.
        Parameters:
        numbers - The numbers of the credit card.
        expirationdate - The expiration date of the credit card.
        cvs - The credit card's security code.
